alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:40AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR EARLY THIS MORNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is expected to change to sleet and freezing rain just after midnight, becoming snow by Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
